Omaha.Dr. C.C. and Mabel L. Criss Library: The Dr. C.C. and Mabel L. Criss Library is a library on the campus of the University of Nebraska Omaha. The library serves as the primary source of academic research information for the UNO community through its collections, services, innovative use of emerging technologies, exhibit and event programming, study spaces and other physical and virtual spaces/facilities.
